mapper.insert:
insert into pms_sku_stock (product_id, sku_code, price, stock, low_stock, pic, sale, promotion_price, lock_stock, sp_data) values
( #{item.productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.skuCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.stock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lowStock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sale, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.promotionPrice, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.lockStock, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.spData, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
